issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: Based on HIVE-20491 / HIVE-20503 discussions, improve Fast Vector MapJoin Bytes Hash Tables by only storing a one word slot entry.
fields.summary: Vectorization: Improve Fast Vector MapJoin Bytes Hash Tables

ATTACHMENT ID: 12938885 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

+1
these tests seems to be related - because the ds now performs better - its selected a different algo earlier in tez_smb_main and bucket_map_join_tez2...
in the last couple weeks I had to update them a few times...so if you apply https://github.com/kgyrtkirk/hive/commit/223788998b85010851353f0ba382d25c8557c993 they will go away...
not sure why...but orc_llap didn't failed for me - but that could be just overwritten....
